pr_title: Standardize DB query normalizer property names

timeline.bodyText: I don't like repeating the instrumentation names here, but you can't exactly access the Instrumenter from the advice. Maybe it'll be possible to fix that once #1274 (comment) is implemented.
timeline.author: mateuszrzeszutek

replies.bodyText: yes, that would be very nice to tie this to the existing instrumentation names 👍
replies.author: trask

timeline.bodyText: In all other cases you have commandNormalizer. Please make the same here as well
timeline.author: iNikem

timeline.message:
Standardize DB query normalizer property names

And add normalizer configuration for Redis, Couchbase, Cassandra and Geode
